search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for EZLynx (ezlynx.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: I couldn't locate an official dedicated pricing page for EZLynx directly on their website. You may need to contact them or request detailed information directly via their website at [ezlynx.com](https://www.ezlynx.com)【3:0†source】.

The All-in-One Insurance Software for Your Success
--------------------------------------------------

EZLynx’s all-in-one agency management system combines your comparative rater, policy management, lead tracking, automated workflows, reporting, and more to help your agency run smoothly and efficiently. **Start with the technology you need to succeed — at special pricing for a limited time.**

 Work Email

[Get Demo](https://www.ezlynx.com/get-started/special-deals-on-ezlynx-software/)

[Get Pricing](https://www.ezlynx.com/get-started/special-deals-on-ezlynx-software/)

  ![Image 15: EZLynx Dashboard](https://res.cloudinary.com/spiralyze/image/upload/f_auto/ezlynx/1003/image_m.webp)

The All-in-One Insurance Software for Your Success
==================================================

EZLynx’s all-in-one agency management system combines your comparative rater, policy management, lead tracking, automated workflows, reporting, and more to help your agency run smoothly and efficiently.

**Start with the technology you need to succeed — at special pricing for a limited time.**

[Get Special Pricing](https://www.ezlynx.com/get-started/special-deals-on-ezlynx-software/)

![Image 16](https://www.ezlynx.com/globalassets/all-images/banner-images/ezlynx/homepage/ezlynx-ab-test-hero-950x720.png)

Industry-leading insurance agency software.
-------------------------------------------

EZLynx provides innovative insurance software that streamlines your agency’s workflow and manages the end-to-end policy lifecycle. Integrated into one platform, EZLynx Management System™ is designed to meet the unique needs of your business in an easy-to-use interface that takes care of doing the work for you. From real-time home and auto quoting on your insurance agency website to email marketing, pipeline management, reporting, AI, and more, EZLynx has the integrated solution for you.

[See Our Solutions](https://www.ezlynx.com/solutions/ "Solutions")

Solutions for the modern insurance agent.
-----------------------------------------

Embrace innovation from Day 1. Whether you are just embarking on your independent agent journey, spinning out to start a new agency of your own, or looking to create a digital insurance storefront, EZLynx is rooted in a commitment to long-term innovation. We stay at the forefront of innovation so you can focus on what you do best – selling and servicing insurance. EZLynx is constantly developing new capabilities across our platform of solutions to make sure we are solving your daily challenges and making technology simple and usable for you today and profitable well into the future.

![Image 17: EZLynx Vision Diagram_1.gif](https://www.ezlynx.com/globalassets/all-images/ezlynx/ezlynx-vision-diagram_1.gif)

Management System
-----------------

Run your agency from anywhere with our cloud-based, easy-to-use management system features. The cloud-based system allows agents to maximize client acquisition and servicing across the entire policy lifecycle. Find each of your customer's quotes, policies, and documents in one place.

[Learn More](https://www.ezlynx.com/products/management-system/ "Management System Product Page")

Rating Engine
-------------

The leading real-time comparative quoting tool for home and auto insurance. It all starts with EZLynx Rating Engine™. Get accurate, live home and auto rates in real time everywhere you go. Think of it as a personal liaison between your agency and all your appointed carriers.

[Learn More](https://www.ezlynx.com/products/rating-engine/ "Rating Engine Product Page")

An Award-Winning Partner Helping Provide You with Innovative Tools to Run Your Agency
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

![Image 18: Leader Winter 2025](https://www.ezlynx.com/siteassets/award-badges/january-2025/insuranceagencymanagementsystems_leader_leader.png) ![Image 19: Leader Small Business Winter 2025](https://www.ezlynx.com/siteassets/award-badges/january-2025/insuranceagencymanagementsystems_leader_small-business_leader.png) ![Image 20: High Performer Winter 2025](https://www.ezlynx.com/siteassets/award-badges/january-2025/insurancecompliance_highperformer_highperformer.png) ![Image 21: High Performer Mid Market Winter 2025](https://www.ezlynx.com/siteassets/award-badges/january-2025/insuranceagencymanagementsystems_highperformer_mid-market_highperformer.png)![Image 22: Fastest Implementation Winter 2025](https://www.ezlynx.com/siteassets/award-badges/january-2025/insurancecompliance_fastestimplementation_golivetime.png)![Image 23: Most Implementable Winter 2025](https://www.ezlynx.com/siteassets/award-badges/january-2025/insurancecompliance_mostimplementable_total.png)![Image 24: High Performer Small Business Winter 2025](https://www.ezlynx.com/siteassets/award-badges/january-2025/cpq_highperformer_small-business_americas_highperformer.png)

Hear from agents just like you.
-------------------------------

![Image 25: Twin Bridges Company Logo](https://www.ezlynx.com/globalassets/all-images/ezlynx/customer-quote-images/customer-quote-twin-bridges-insurance.png)

> The rater and management system work together seamlessly, and all on one platform. In addition, the price is very affordable, it's easy to use, and their customer support is outstanding! I now use EZLynx for everything.

Steve Vogel, Twin Bridges Insurance

### More agencies choose EZLynx every day than any other insurance software provider.

*   55,666

Our partnership approach extends to more networks and clusters to provide solutions for all agencies and their master agencies, including:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

![Image 26: siaa-logo.png](https://www.ezlynx.com/globalassets/all-images/logos/partners/ezlynx/siaa-logo.png) ![Image 27: smart-choice-logo.svg](https://www.ezlynx.com/globalassets/all-images/logos/partners/ezlynx/smart-choice-logo.svg) ![Image 28: PGI-logo.png](https://www.ezlynx.com/globalassets/all-images/logos/partners/ezlynx/pgi-logo.png) ![Image 29: PGI-logo.png](https://www.ezlynx.com/globalassets/all-images/logos/partners/ezlynx/pia-select-logo.png)

[View More](https://www.ezlynx.com/about-us/who-we-serve/alliance-partners/#content "View Alliance Partners")

The All-in-One Insurance Software for Your Success
==================================================

EZLynx’s all-in-one agency management system combines your comparative rater, policy management, lead tracking, automated workflows, reporting, and more to help your agency run smoothly and efficiently.

**Start with the technology you need to succeed — at special pricing for a limited time.**

[Get Special Pricing](https://www.ezlynx.com/get-started/special-deals-on-ezlynx-software/)

![Image 16](https://www.ezlynx.com/globalassets/all-images/banner-images/ezlynx/homepage/ezlynx-ab-test-hero-950x720.png)

Industry-leading insurance agency software.
-------------------------------------------

EZLynx provides innovative insurance software that streamlines your agency’s workflow and manages the end-to-end policy lifecycle. Integrated into one platform, EZLynx Management System™ is designed to meet the unique needs of your business in an easy-to-use interface that takes care of doing the work for you. From real-time home and auto quoting on your insurance agency website to email marketing, pipeline management, reporting, AI, and more, EZLynx has the integrated solution for you.

[See Our Solutions](https://www.ezlynx.com/solutions/ "Solutions")

Solutions for the modern insurance agent.
-----------------------------------------

Embrace innovation from Day 1. Whether you are just embarking on your independent agent journey, spinning out to start a new agency of your own, or looking to create a digital insurance storefront, EZLynx is rooted in a commitment to long-term innovation. We stay at the forefront of innovation so you can focus on what you do best – selling and servicing insurance. EZLynx is constantly developing new capabilities across our platform of solutions to make sure we are solving your daily challenges and making technology simple and usable for you today and profitable well into the future.

![Image 17: EZLynx Vision Diagram_1.gif](https://www.ezlynx.com/globalassets/all-images/ezlynx/ezlynx-vision-diagram_1.gif)

Management System
-----------------

Run your agency from anywhere with our cloud-based, easy-to-use management system features. The cloud-based system allows agents to maximize client acquisition and servicing across the entire policy lifecycle. Find each of your customer's quotes, policies, and documents in one place.

[Learn More](https://www.ezlynx.com/products/management-system/ "Management System Product Page")

Rating Engine
-------------

The leading real-time comparative quoting tool for home and auto insurance. It all starts with EZLynx Rating Engine™. Get accurate, live home and auto rates in real time everywhere you go. Think of it as a personal liaison between your agency and all your appointed carriers.

[Learn More](https://www.ezlynx.com/products/rating-engine/ "Rating Engine Product Page")

An Award-Winning Partner Helping Provide You with Innovative Tools to Run Your Agency
